content: Blackjack.fun is an online crypto casino platform that provides both in-house and partner games. We accept various cryptocurrencies. Blackjack.fun has been operating since 2018. With updates and improvements every week since, the platform aims to compete with older, bigger sites. Blackjack.fun's greatest achievement is its community. The members can get involved in the functionality of the platform, they can bring improvements, change various aspects of the experience and even suggest games. All these are meant to provide their members a unique experience, an honest, transparent and safe approach, and a place shaped based on their perspective.We are looking for some good Twitter profiles for posting tweets for us. We will pay $5-$10 / tweet depending on the Twitter profile.    Rules and RequrementsYou must follow @blackjack_fun twitter profileOnly Member and higher-ranked bitcointalk accounts will be accepted.Alternative accounts are not acceptedOne tweet per userThe Twitter profile must have more than 200 followers.Twitter audit score must be above 95%You must use the Twitter format from below.You can not delete the tweet that you will do for this campaign in at least 1 monthOnly accepted users will be paid. If you tweet before accepting, it's your responsibility If you are tagged by a DT for a legitimate reason you can not participate in this campaignPayment$5 worth of BTC will be credited to your bitcoin addressTweet FormatCode:USDT Airdrop on http://Blackjack.fun Chat. - Follow @blackjack_fun- Retweet and like this tweet- Comment "twitter sent me" in  http://blackjack.fun Chat. -Airdrop Guaranteed. You must have to add an image from below     https://imgur.com/2nq5PmF                                 https://imgur.com/5a5F7akHow to ApplyCode:Your bitcointalk profile link:Your Twitter profile link:Your Twitter audit link: Your Twitter followers: Your correct BTC Address:
